mapper.select: SELECT b.id id, b.member_id memberId, m.birthday birthday, m.name name, m.sex sex, m.phone phone, b.time time FROM t_member m, t_birthday b WHERE m.id = b.member_id AND b.time like "%"#{time}"%" limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(b.id) count FROM t_member m, t_birthday b WHERE m.id = b.member_id AND b.time like "%"#{time}"%"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_birthday ( member_id, time ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, now() )
